full_summary:
### Vehicle Training Course (Tender W2037-240088B)

#### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this request for proposals for the Vehicle Training Course – W2037-240088B. The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end-user of the services.

#### Solicitation Details

| **Category** | **Description** | **Details** |
| --- | --- | ---|
| **Reference Number** |WS4417615152-Doc4480433967 | |
| **Solicitation Number** |WS4417615152 | |
| **Publication Date** |2024-03-08 | |
| **Tender Closing Date **|2024-03-15T14:00:00 | |
| **Anticipated Contract Start Date** |2024-04-01 | |
| **Anticipated Contract End Date** |2025-02-21 | |

#### Goods/Services Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods/Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements Applied**:
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name**: Robert Berends (LPP PCS / SP)
* **Contact Email**: robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
